generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to parked cars and a building.
- building: A building with multiple windows and a dark facade is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along both sides of the road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible in the middle of the road, being ridden by a person.
- rider: A person is riding the motorcycle in the middle of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible along the road, including a round "no entry" sign and a rectangular directional sign.
- terrain: Grass and other vegetation are visible along the edges of the road and sidewalks.
